Description: Our server infrastructure is monitored 24/7/365 to ensure maximum uptime.

Accounts are locked for 30 minutes after 5 consecutive failed login attempts.

We support frictionless payments via Apple Pay, PayPal, and major credit cards.

We support Web, iOS, Android, macOS, and Windows native applications.

Data is distributed across Google Cloud regions in the US and Europe.
Ensure notification permissions are enabled in both your browser and OS settings.
